description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard, At-Will

Reach 3

+26 vs AC; 2d68+5 damage, and the target takes ongoing 20 necrotic damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard, At-Will

Reach 3

+26 vs AC; 2d10+5 damage.

At-Will

Standard, At-Will

The dragon makes two claw attacks.

At-Will ✦ Fear, Psychic

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 20

+24 vs Will; 2d6+9 psychic damage. Until the end of the dragon's next turn, when the target deals damage, it takes psychic damage equal to half the amount dealt.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Necrotic

Standard, Recharge

Close blast 10

+25 vs Fortitude; 3d8+5 necrotic damage, and the target is blinded until the end of the dragon's next turn. Miss: Half damage, and the target is not blinded.

Encounter ✦ Necrotic

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard, Encounter

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +25 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Fear, Psychic

Standard, Recharge

Area burst 5 within 10

+24 vs Will; 4d6+9 psychic damage. When the target deals damage, it takes psychic damage equal to half the amount dealt (save ends).

HP 980; Bloodied 490
Resist 35 necrotic, 30 variable (2/encounter) 		Init +16 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 39Fort 36Ref 37Will 39
Speed 9, climb 9 (spider climb), fly 8 (hover); phasing
Ability ScoresStr 20 (+15)
Con 26 (+18)		Dex 23 (+16)
Int 22 (+16)		Wis 22 (+16)
Cha 28 (+19)
Languages Abyssal, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Bluff +24, Dungeoneering +21, Intimidate +24Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 26 | Insight 26
